    • Method Detail

      • updateBasket

        @RequestMapping(value="/ajax/basket")
@ResponseBody
protected String updateBasket(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                              @RequestParam
                                              String id,
                                              @RequestParam
                                              Boolean checked,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Updates the basket with enzymes (summaries) to compare or download.
        Parameters:
        response - the HTTP response to write to.
        id - the basket ID to add/remove (see Functions.getSummaryBasketId(EnzymeSummary). It may be a semicolon-separated list of basket IDs, which will be processed in block.
        checked - if true, add the accession; if false, remove it.
        session - the user session.
        Returns:
        a string with the current number of enzymes in the basket.

      • getBasket

        @RequestMapping(value="/basket")
protected String getBasket(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      • getComparison

        @RequestMapping(value="/compare")
protected String getComparison(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                  @RequestParam(value="acc")
                                  String[] accs)
                        throws uk.ac.ebi.ep.entry.exception.EnzymeRetrieverException
        Compares the two enzymes (accessions) stored in the user session (see #Attribute.basket.name().
        Parameters:
        model - the model to populate with the comparison.
        session - the user session containing the enzymes' accessions.
        accs - UniProt accessions of the enzymes to be compared (exactly 2).
        Returns:
        "comparison" if everything goes well, "error" otherwise (less than two enzymes selected to compare, for example).
        Throws:
        uk.ac.ebi.ep.entry.exception.EnzymeRetrieverException - in case of problem retrieving the enzymes, before the comparison.
